casebody.data:
Harris et al., Appellants, v. Kennedy et al., Appellees.

[Cite as Harris v. Kennedy (1997), 80 Ohio St.3d 1211.]

(No. 96-1467 Submitted October 21, 1997 Decided December 3, 1997.) Levey & Gruhin and Harold L. Levey, for appellants. Sharon Sobol Jordan, Cleveland Director of Law, and Charles E. Hannan, Jr., Assistant Director of Law, for appellees.

The appeal is dismissed, sua sponte, as having been improvidently allowed.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. Douglas, J., dissents.
